skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I am a passionate frontend developer, crafting visually appealing and user-friendly websites with expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Committed to creating seamless digital experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Coding enthusiast specializing in backend development. Proficient in Python, Java, and Node.js, I design scalable server solutions, prioritize data integrity, and optimize system performance.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: As a UI/UX designer, I merge creativity and user-centered principles to craft delightful digital experiences. My designs prioritize usability, aesthetics, and seamless interactions for optimal user engagement.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: I excel in Webflow development, leveraging its intuitive interface to bring web designs to life with efficiency and precision. Creating responsive and dynamic websites is my forte.
